    • Method Detail

      • item

        public String item()
        Retrieves the focus item IRI of this request.
        Specified by:
        item in class Message<Request>
        Returns:
        the absolute IRI obtained by concatenating base and path for this request

      • request

        public Request request()
        Retrieves the originating request for this request.
        Specified by:
        request in class Message<Request>
        Returns:
        this request

      • reply

        public Future<Response> reply(int status)
        Creates a response for this request.
        Parameters:
        status - the status code for the response
        Returns:
        a new lazy response associated to this request
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if response is less than 100 or greater than 599

      • reply

        public Future<Response> reply(Function<Response,Response> mapper)
        Creates a response for this request.
        Parameters:
        mapper - the mapping function used to initialize the new response; must return a non-null value
        Returns:
        a new lazy response associated to this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null or return a null value

      • safe

        public boolean safe()
        Checks if this request is safe.
        Returns:
        true if this request is safe, that is if it's not expected to cause any state change on the origin server ; false otherwise

      • container

        public boolean container()
        Checks if this request targets a container.
        Returns:
        true if the path() of this request includes a trailing slash; false otherwise
        See Also:
        Linked Data Platform Best Practices and Guidelines - § 2.6 Include a trailing slash in container URIs

      • role

        public boolean role(String... roles)
        Checks if this request if performed by a user in a target set of roles.
        Parameters:
        roles - the target set if roles to be checked
        Returns:
        true if this request is performed by a user in one of the given roles, that is if roles and request roles are not disjoint

      • role

        public boolean role(Collection<String> roles)
        Checks if this request if performed by a user in a target set of roles.
        Parameters:
        roles - the target set if roles to be checked
        Returns:
        true if this request is performed by a user in one of the given roles, that is if roles and request roles are not disjoint

      • user

        public String user()
        Retrieves the identifier of the request user.
        Returns:
        an identifier for the user performing this request or the empty string if no user is authenticated

      • user

        public Request user(String user)
        Configures the identifier of the request user.
        Parameters:
        user - an identifier for the user performing this request or the empty stringif no user is authenticated
        Returns:
        this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if user is null

      • roles

        public Set<String> roles()
        Retrieves the roles attributed to the request user.
        Returns:
        a set of values uniquely identifying the roles attributed to the request user

        public Request roles(String... roles)
        Configures the roles attributed to the request user.
        Parameters:
        roles - a collection of values uniquely identifying the roles attributed to the request user
        Returns:
        this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if roles is null or contains a null value

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if roles is null or contains a null value

      • method

        public String method()
        Retrieves the HTTP method of this request.
        Returns:
        the HTTP method of this request; in upper case

      • method

        public Request method(String method)
        Configures the HTTP method of this request.
        Parameters:
        method - the HTTP method for this request; will be automatically converted to upper case
        Returns:
        this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if method is null

      • base

        public String base()
        Retrieves the base IRI of this request.
        Returns:
        the base IRI of this request, that is the base IRI if the linked data server handling the request; includes a trailing slash

      • base

        public Request base(String base)
        Configures the base IRI of this request.
        Parameters:
        base - the base IRI for this request, that is the base IRI if the linked data server handling the request
        Returns:
        this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if base is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if base is not an absolute IRI or if it doesn't include a trailing slash

      • path

        public String path()
        Retrieves the resource path of this request.
        Returns:
        the resource path of this request, that is the absolute server path of the linked data resources this request refers to; includes a leading slash

      • path

        public Request path(String path)
        Configures the resource path of this request.
        Parameters:
        path - the resource path of this request, that is the absolute server path of the linked data resources this request refers to
        Returns:
        this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if path is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if path doesn't include a leading slash

      • query

        public String query()
        Retrieves the query component of this request.
        Returns:
        the query component this request

      • query

        public Result<Query,Failure> query(Shape shape,
                                   BiFunction<javax.json.JsonValue,Shape,Object> parser)
        Retrieves the shape-based query of this request.
        Parameters:
        shape - the base shape for the query
        parser - a shape-based function mapping from JSON to engine specific values
        Returns:
        a value providing access to the combined query merging constraints from shape and the request query string, if successfully parsed using the parser; an error providing access to the parsing failure, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if shape is null

      • query

        public Request query(String query)
        Configures the query component of this request.
        Parameters:
        query - the query component of this request
        Returns:
        this request
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if query is null

      • parameters

        public Map<String,Collection<String>> parameters()
        Retrieves request query parameters.
        Returns:
        an immutable and possibly empty map from query parameters names to collections of values

      • parameters

        public Request parameters(Map<String,? extends Collection<String>> parameters)
        Configures request query parameters.

        Existing values are overwritten.

        Parameters:
        parameters - a map from parameter names to lists of values
        Returns:
        this message
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if parameters is null or contains either null keys or null values

      • parameter

        public Optional<String> parameter(String name)
        Retrieves request query parameter value.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the query parameter whose value is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        an optional value containing the first value among those returned by parameters(String), if one is present; an empty optional otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null

      • parameter

        public Request parameter(String name,
                         String value)
        Configures request query parameter value.

        Existing values are overwritten.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the query parameter whose value is to be configured
        value - the new value for name
        Returns:
        this message
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either name or value is null

      • parameters

        public List<String> parameters(String name)
        Retrieves request query parameter values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the query parameter whose values are to be retrieved
        Returns:
        an immutable and possibly empty collection of values

      • parameters

        public Request parameters(String name,
                          String... values)
        Configures request query parameter values.

        Existing values are overwritten.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the query parameter whose values are to be configured
        values - a possibly empty collection of values
        Returns:
        this message
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either name or values is null or if values contains a null value

      • parameters

        public Request parameters(String name,
                          Collection<String> values)
        Configures request query parameter values.

        Existing values are overwritten.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the query parameter whose values are to be configured
        values - a possibly empty collection of values
        Returns:
        this message
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either name or values is null or if values contains a null value
